pages.text: Vault gear can not be repaired by normal means, and Mending dont work on vaultgear. So your saving grace is the repair cores.$(br)When combined with a gear in a anvil will take one repairpoint and fully repair your gear. Commonly found in God Altars
combine with a tier 1 vaultgear in an anvil to repair
combine with a tier 2 vaultgear in an anvil to repair
combine with a tier 3 vaultgear in an anvil to repair
